name: SurviveTheBeat
description:
This game is made in 2 days from ground up. This is my submission for the Mini Jam 125: Signal.  

You are an electronic music loving outlaw. Your enemies have set you a trap in your favourite night club. Everytime a speaker is loud enough it will send a missile towards you.  

Controls: 

Avoid missiles they decrease your score when hit. 

W - move up 

S - move down 

A - move left 

D - move right 

SPACE - dash (You cant dash while exhausted hence the red face)

M - main menu 

Credits: 

YankiDev - Assets and programming (Yes the artstyle is intentional, I am trying something)

Ozbo - Soundtracks
